tool_description: Get statistics on thousands of planets in the known universe. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/planets.
name: Planets by API-Ninjas
title: Planets by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/planets
api_list.description: Get a list of planets matching specified parameters. Returns at most 30 results. To access more than 30 results, use the offset parameter to offset results in multiple API calls.

optional_parameters.name: max_period
optional_parameters.description: maximum orbital period of the planet in Earth days.

optional_parameters.name: max_temperature
optional_parameters.description: maximum average surface temperature of the planet in Kelvin.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: number of results to offset for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: max_distance_light_year
optional_parameters.description: maximum distance the planet is from Earth in light years.

optional_parameters.name: min_distance_light_year
optional_parameters.description: minimum distance the planet is from Earth in light years.

optional_parameters.name: max_mass
optional_parameters.description: maximum mass of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 1.898 × 10^27 kg).

optional_parameters.name: max_semi_major_axis
optional_parameters.description: maximum semi major axis of planet in astronomical units (AU).

optional_parameters.name: min_mass
optional_parameters.description: minimum mass of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 1.898 × 10^27 kg).

optional_parameters.name: min_semi_major_axis
optional_parameters.description: minimum semi major axis of planet in astronomical units (AU).

optional_parameters.name: min_temperature
optional_parameters.description: minimum average surface temperature of the planet in Kelvin.

optional_parameters.name: max_radius
optional_parameters.description: maximum average radius of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 69911 km).

optional_parameters.name: min_radius
optional_parameters.description: minimum average radius of the planet in Jupiters (1 Jupiter = 69911 km).

optional_parameters.name: min_period
optional_parameters.description: minimum orbital period of the planet in Earth days.
